title: Bir Sreshtha Ruhul Aminâ€™s 54th martyrdom anniv observed
body: The 54th martyrdom anniversary of Bir Sreshtha Ruhul Amin, one of the seven highest gallantry award recipients of the Liberation War, was observed with due honour and solemnity in Khulna on Wednesday. Besides, the 54th nartyrdom anniversary of Bir Bikram Mohibullah, who made the supreme sacrifice in the War of Liberation, was also observed on the same day. To mark the anniversary, the Bangladesh Navy in Khulna arranged programmes, including laying wreaths at the graves, discussions on their heroism, special prayers. Commander of Khulna naval area Rear Admiral AKM Zakir Hossain placed floral wreaths at the memorial of the two heroes and presented a guard of honour. A significant number of officers and sailors of the Khulna naval area were present on the occasion. A special prayer was offered seeking eternal peace for the departed souls of the martyrs. Besides, after zuhr prayers, special prayers were also held at all mosques under the Khulna naval area, seeking divine blessings for all martyred freedom fighters who laid down their lives in the Liberation War. Officers and sailors of the naval area attended the prayers.
